definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The weighted functions are obtained based on the use of completed systems of general solution of the corresponding homogeneous equations .
sentences.chinese: 權函數是得自對應的齊次微分方程的一般解和完備系。

sentences.english: His work remains mathematically in the realm of ordinary differential equations.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作在數學上就停留在常微分方程的範圍。

sentences.english: In the derivation both the induced vibration and couple vibration were considerd.
sentences.chinese: 本文建立了浸入水中輸運流體管道耦合振動微分方程。

sentences.english: This paper studies the initial boundary value problem for a class of quasilinear pesudoparabolic integrodifferential equations.
sentences.chinese: 研究一類擬線性擬拋物型積分微分方程的初邊值問題。

sentences.english: In these differential equations, the concentration gradients of different reaction components are strongly coupled together.
sentences.chinese: 微分方程中各個反應組分的濃度梯度強烈相互耦合。

sentences.english: In this paper, we deal with the constant C in the solution of first order differential equations.
sentences.chinese: 詳細闡述解一階微分方程任意常數C的處理。

sentences.english: Meshless method is a new numerical method on problem for determining solution of differential equation.
sentences.chinese: 無網格法是求解微分方程定解問題的一種新數值方法。

sentences.english: Authers call this method as generalized equilibriUm differential equations of shaft twisting.
sentences.chinese: 作者把其稱爲軸扭轉時的廣義平衡微分方程。

sentences.english: A group of complex differential equations must be solved for the ballistic calculation of air-to-air missile.
sentences.chinese: 空空導彈彈道計算需要解算一組複雜的微分方程。

sentences.english: Image noise removal by PDEs model is an effective tool.
sentences.chinese: 應用偏微分方程進行圖像去噪是一種有效的工具。

sentences.english: it is a partial differential equation satisfied by the electric field E.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個，由電場E確定的偏微分方程。

sentences.english: Now, how to solve partial differential equations is not a topic for this class.
The theory of the solution of partial differential equations remained to be fashioned.
sentences.chinese: 偏微分方程解的理論還有待於形成。

sentences.english: Often the existence axioms of classic in the differential calculus square distance can't use.
sentences.chinese: 常微分方程中經典的存在性定理不能使用。

sentences.english: The differential equation for the vibration of the riser system is derived by means of functional calculus of variation.
sentences.chinese: 採用泛函變分法導出了隔水管的振動微分方程。

sentences.english: Random differential equations of minor noise were established by means of perturbation theory of minor noise.
sentences.chinese: 通過小噪聲攝動理論，建立了小噪聲隨機微分方程。
